name: Strawberries & Cream (Vitamin enhanced)
description: Made with 100% certified organic and naturally grown produce picked in Australia, plus other carefully selected superfoods and herbs sourced from around the globe. Queenstown is dedicated to making the finest vegan and vegetarian friendly, organically and locally sourced, flavourful smoothies and juices.
